product_description.product_id: QLD - Acacia Ridge - Climate Active - QE40XDIA
product_description.product_use: Concrete prepared by mixing cement, coarse and fine aggregates, and water, with or without auxiliary agents and additives. Used for foundations, driveways, footpaths, high-rise buildings, dams, roads, bridges, public works infrastructure, etc.

product_classes.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths.
product_classes.special_class: Supplied to major construction projects including high-strength/high-performance concrete, high durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications.

product_description.hazardous_substances: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation exceeding 0.1% by weight.
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging.

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.time_representativeness: Plant data from 2022 calendar year; mix data from 2023 calendar year

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight at quarry and m³ of concrete at batching plant; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging; packaging excluded except for materials packaging

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good to very good across all data sources
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: All data updated within 10 years as required

processes_included.upstream: Extraction, transport and manufacturing of raw materials; generation of electricity from primary and secondary energy resources
processes_included.core: External transportation of materials to core processes; manufacturing of concrete (excluding mixing in truck); treatment of waste and wastewater
processes_included.downstream: Distribution of concrete mixes; installation on site; wastage of construction products; transport and treatment of waste at end of life

installation.activities_included: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities such as site work and forms

assumptions.deconstruction_method: Physical process of drilling and removing concrete using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

embodied_carbon_reduction_targets.by_2050: Net zero for all new construction materials

carbon_emission_context.carbonation_note: CO2 absorption by concrete (carbonation) during use stage onward is recognized but not included in this EPD's results
carbon_emission_context.carbon_footprint_reporting: Includes GWP total, fossil, biogenic, and land use change emissions per 1 m³ ready-mix concrete

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Economic allocation due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes

additional_info.product_safety: Classified as Non-Dangerous Goods according to Australian Code for Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail
additional_info.hazard_phrases: Listed in safety data sheet for pre-mixed concrete
